title: Add 12 new Physical State moods to frontend catalog

requirements.summary: Add the 12 specified Physical State mood options (label + emoji) to the frontend mood catalog so they appear in MoodPicker across Daily Check-In and Compose.
acceptanceCriteria: The MoodPicker shows all 12 new moods grouped under the "Physical State" category.
Daily Check-In mood selection and Compose mood selection both display the new moods with the specified emojis.
TypeScript build passes (the new entries reference valid `Mood.*` enum values generated from the backend).

Ensure each entry references the matching `Mood.<variant>` value and do not change any existing categories, labels/emojis, or picker behavior beyond adding these options.
